aliases.name: test
aliases.command: cls && dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" && gittey commit
aliases.description: runs tests and commits if the tests succeed

aliases.name: undo
aliases.description: sets project state to that of the last committed state

aliases.name: shrink
aliases.command: npx rimrafx **/bin; npx rimrafx **/obj; npx rimrafx **/TestResults; npx rimrafx **/coveragereport
aliases.description: removes all untracked files and directories

aliases.name: docs
aliases.description: sets project state to that of the last committed state

aliases.name: setup
aliases.description: sets the project up to be run
